title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 666.5 - Corporate operations expense
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 666.5 - Corporate operations expense

State Regulations

The corporate operations expense accounts, 6710 through
6790, shall include the costs of performing executive and planning activities
and general and administrative activities described in narratives for
individual accounts. These costs shall also include the costs of supervision, office support and training for these activities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
666.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
